name: Connect xD — Match dots by color game
name_original: Connect xD — Match dots by color game
description:
Addictive and entertaining game. Connect the dots of the same color by creating a pipe.
Match all colors, filling the board completely.
Pipes can not overlap, use your ability to solve all levels.
Have fun with this puzzle, use your wits to join the dots of the same color.
Use the hints to solve the puzzles, if they finish you can buy more.
